description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=3/3. The orbital sherbet farms are under attack! Strap on your jetpack and defend the tasty crop from aliens, hungry stoners, pirates, and sherbet thieves!  Twin-stick arcade action sherbet defense simulation excitement awaits you!  3 levels of difficulty, 19 hilarious story-mode levels, and a never-ending survival mode. Grab a friend for co-op sherbet party!
